Module Photos02
Package model

Class Album

java.lang.Object
model.Album
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Album extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an Album that users can add pictures to.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • exists

      public boolean exists(String fp)
      Checks if a photo exists in the album.
      Parameters:
      fp - The file path of the photo.
      Returns:
      true if the photo exists, false otherwise.

    • getFirstDate

      public String getFirstDate()
      Gets the date of the first added photo in the album.
      Returns:
      The formatted date string or "No Date" if no photos are present.

    • getLastDate

      Gets the date of the last altered photo in the album.
      Returns:
      The formatted date string or "No Date" if no photos are present.

    • load

      public static Album load() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Loads the album from a .dat file.
      Returns:
      The loaded album.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while loading.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class of the serialized object cannot be found.
